title: Rob Zombie
summary: Robert Bartleh Cummings[7][8] (born January 12, 1965),[9] known professionally as Rob Zombie, is an American singer, songwriter, filmmaker, and voice actor. He is a founding member of the heavy metal band White Zombie, releasing four studio albums with the band. He is the older brother of Spider One, the lead vocalist of the industrial metal band Powerman 5000.[10][11]
